vi@v-os.ca

V-OS is a virtual library of projects, narratives, and experiments.

This digital space is a virtual library of my digital artwork and related stories from VOIDNET.

I'm Victor Ivanov [vi], and I'm the creator of this space. More about me in my portfolio.

V-OS is a wiki, where all bold text is clickable. Please enjoy exploring.
Feel lost? Start by browing some projects down below.
